reviews.review: Das spiel ist zwar alt aber Echt cool! Man kann am anfang  gegen bots spielen oder mit freunden. Es macht immer Spass!
this is a very fun game to play  and i recommend it to others
Es un juego muy intuitivo, mecánicas simples pero entretenidas. La comunidad es bastante grande y amigable.

Super gra, gram w nią przez 4 lata. Może i dodano jakieś modele postaci które totalnie psują klimat gry, a co ważniejsze zabawe dla nowych graczy. Lecz kiedy gramy, znamy sposoby na to i jest łatwo. Ale gra idze coraz to niżej w kierunku "upadku".
Kannattaa pelata, mutta muteta venäläiset ensin :)
this game is so good thanks Steam

When playing without prime I'd not recommend this game, because of the amount of cheating happening in f2p lobbies. When playing with prime this does not happen as often and the game becomes 10x more enjoyable. The prime matchmaking system allows for you to play with players that have similar skills and amounts of hours. Overall pretty enjoyable if you ignore the toxicity of the general playerbase.
its a really fun and cool game
